meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7715.

td.p: Mark Ashton, a software engineer from Elmhurst, Illinois
Megan Durazo, a librarian from Playa Del Rey, California
Lane Flynn, a business owner from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $38,399)

tr.td: AROUND THE CATHEDRAL
OUR SOLAR SYSTEM
CHESS PIECES IN DISGUISE
INTO THE "WOOD"S
BRITAIN'S INDUSTRIAL REVOLUTION
